articles.author: DAVID KOENIG AP Airlines Writer
articles.title: American Airlines, JetBlue seek to keep some ties despite losing antitrust case - ABC News
articles.description: American Airlines and JetBlue are trying to salvage parts of their partnership in the Northeast, even after a federal judge ruled they must break up the deal
articles.content: American Airlines and JetBlue said Friday they should be allowed to keep selling tickets on each other's flights in the Northeast and link their frequent-flyer programs despite losing an antitrust tr… [+1986 chars]
